content.title: Girl Students Health & Hygiene Scheme
content.beneficiary: Girl students studying in classes VI to XII
content.details: The scheme 'Girl Students Health & Hygiene Scheme' was announced by the Department of School Education, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh in 2013. This scheme is basically providing incentives towards the beneficiaries of girl child students studying in classes VI to XII only which institutes/schools are fully run by the State Govt. and Govt. Aided Schools in Arunachal Pradesh. The main aim and objective of this scheme are to be retained and continue in the schools during the occurrence of their menstrual period. Further, this scheme increases awareness among adolescent girls on Menstrual Hygiene.
benefits: ₹50/- per student per month in all Govt. schools through DBT (all year amount is credited to the account of the beneficiary)
eligibility: All girl students from class VI to XII studying in government and government-aided schools in Arunachal Pradesh.
content.application_process: Girls Students will not need to fill any application form to take benefits of the scheme. Sanitary napkins will be given to the girl students by their schools. Girl students may also contact the Director of Elementary and Secondary Education in their concerned district.
documents_required: School Identity Card (Admission in School- All Govt. Schools and Govt-aided Schools)
Bank details of the applicant/concerned girl student

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective of the scheme is to increase awareness among adolescent girls on Menstrual Hygiene.

faqs.question: By which department was this scheme started?
faqs.answer: The scheme was stated by the Department of Education.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of this scheme?
faqs.answer: ₹50/- per month is given to each girl student in all Govt. schools through DBT.

faqs.question: Who is eligible under this scheme?
faqs.answer: All girl students from class VI to XII studying in government and government-aided schools in Arunachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: Can a student of a private school avail the benefit of this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, girl students studying in government and government-aided schools are eligible for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can I apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The girl students need not apply to take benefits of the scheme.

faqs.question: How can I get sanitary napkins under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The sanitary napkins will be given to the girl students by their schools.
